name: Space Explorer (Pratik Goswami)
description:
Curious about Space or the Solar System?

Why not explore the Solar system with your own Spaceship! As an explorer from Earth you can traverse the vastness of space and explore the Solar System. Rather than having any goal, its a chill experience of visiting all the planets to a lo-fi music.

This is still a learning experience from me and any comments are welcome.

Controls:
Mouse - To look at a Direction
W/A/S/D - To move
Q/E - Move Down & Up Respectively
LShift - Boost
Esc - Pause
